name: kidvo_la_rare_01
text: All can be known, and known by me.
text_simple: all can be known and known by me

name: kidvo_la_rare_02
text: The universe has long awaited my arrival.
text_simple: the universe has long awaited my arrival

name: kidvo_la_rare_03
text: The headmaster thought to keep me away. Let the ruins of the academy teach his fate to others.
text_simple: the headmaster thought to keep me away let the ruins of the academy teach his fate to others

name: kidvo_la_rare_04
text: I was not content to wait aeons. Dangerous magics bring me here... to now.
text_simple: i was not content to wait aeons dangerous magics bring me here to now

name: kidvo_la_rare_05
text: Behold before you, the illustrious, imperious, ingenious arch-mage... CARL.
text_simple: behold before you the illustrious imperious ingenious archmage carl

name: kidvo_la_spawn_04
text: What joy it is beholding me!
text_simple: what joy it is beholding me

name: kidvo_la_spawn_06
text: Let's see what all this fuss is about...
text_simple: lets see what all this fuss is about

name: kidvo_la_spawn_07
text_simple: the time has come for me

name: kidvo_la_spawn_08
text: You fear not because I'm young? Your fear should be greater.
text_simple: you fear not because im young your fear should be greater

name: kidvo_la_spawn_09
text: I'm told that I'm a pretty big deal in this time. Trust me, nothing's changed.
text_simple: im told that im a pretty big deal in this time trust me nothings changed

name: kidvo_la_intro_01
text: This is my kind of story.
text_simple: this is my kind of story

name: kidvo_la_begin_01
text: So begins a new age of knowledge!
text_simple: so begins a new age of knowledge

name: kidvo_la_begin_02
text: I've been waiting a long time for this. Relatively.
text_simple: ive been waiting a long time for this relatively
criteria: Custom Isinvoker IsKidvoker IsGameStart|Custom Isinvoker IsKidvokerLoadoutSpawn
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: kidvo_la_begin_03
text: This day will be long remembered by those who survive my fury.
text_simple: this day will be long remembered by those who survive my fury

name: kidvo_la_first_01
text: First blood, as indeed I am first in everything.
text_simple: first blood as indeed i am first in everything

name: kidvo_la_first_02
text: First blood was never yours to take.
text_simple: first blood was never yours to take

name: kidvo_la_first_03
text: First blood! At last, no headmaster to save you.
text_simple: first blood at last no headmaster to save you

text: You should be more fully aware of me!
text_simple: you should be more fully aware of me

name: kidvo_la_ability_icewall_07
text: I call upon ice and storm!
text_simple: i call upon ice and storm

name: kidvo_la_failure_12
text: The errant cosmos works against me!
text_simple: the errant cosmos works against me

name: kidvo_la_level_01
text: Oh, they'll rue the day they crossed me!
text_simple: oh theyll rue the day they crossed me

name: kidvo_la_level_03
text: The profundities are mine to ransack!
text_simple: the profundities are mine to ransack

name: kidvo_la_level_05
text: I am a beacon of knowledge blazing out across a black sea of ignorance.
text_simple: i am a beacon of knowledge blazing out across a black sea of ignorance

name: kidvo_la_level_06
text: Cause for my enemies to dwell on me exclusively!
text_simple: cause for my enemies to dwell on me exclusively

name: kidvo_la_level_14
text: Mwa ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: mwa ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: kidvo_la_kill_02
text: I must have stepped on something.
text_simple: i must have stepped on something

name: kidvo_la_kill_03
text: Whatever that was, twas scarcely worth my notice.
text_simple: whatever that was twas scarcely worth my notice

name: kidvo_la_kill_04
text: Whosoever stands against me, stands briefly.
text_simple: whosoever stands against me stands briefly

name: kidvo_la_kill_05
text_simple: fools die as you well know

name: kidvo_la_kill_06
text: Give it not a second thought.
text_simple: give it not a second thought

name: kidvo_la_kill_07
text: Mark these words: they're the last you'll hear.
text_simple: mark these words theyre the last youll hear

name: kidvo_la_kill_09
text: You'd have done better to clothe yourself in knowledge, for all the good your scraps of armor did you.
text_simple: youd have done better to clothe yourself in knowledge for all the good your scraps of armor did you

name: kidvo_la_kill_10
text: You die as you lived: insipid and ignorant.
text_simple: you die as you lived insipid and ignorant

name: kidvo_la_kill_11_02
text: You were no match for my powers. But then, who is?
text_simple: you were no match for my powers but then who is

name: kidvo_la_kill_12
text: Like a match already dim and damp, your mind snuffs out.
text_simple: like a match already dim and damp your mind snuffs out

name: kidvo_la_death_02
text: Darkness and ignorance take you all!
text_simple: darkness and ignorance take you all

name: kidvo_la_death_04
text: An end to ages of learning.
text_simple: an end to ages of learning

name: kidvo_la_death_05
text: The archives of time are lost with me.
text_simple: the archives of time are lost with me

name: kidvo_la_death_06
text: Outside my mind, nothing is real.
text_simple: outside my mind nothing is real

name: kidvo_la_death_07
text: All that matters, perishes with me.
text_simple: all that matters perishes with me

name: kidvo_la_death_13_03
text: Put me out of your mind.
text_simple: put me out of your mind

name: kidvo_la_fastres_01
text: Remember me, for I will remember you!
text_simple: remember me for i will remember you
criteria: Custom Isinvoker IsKidvokerLoadoutSpawn|Death Isinvoker IsKidvoker IsReincarnating
pretty_criteria: Spawning in the loadout|Dying and respawning from aegis

name: kidvo_la_fastres_02
text: Death is but a lapse in my concentration...
text_simple: death is but a lapse in my concentration

name: kidvo_la_respawn_01
text: I return with nary a mark upon me.
text_simple: i return with nary a mark upon me

name: kidvo_la_respawn_02
text: I remember now what I was about.
text_simple: i remember now what i was about

name: kidvo_la_respawn_03
text: I shall be mindful, make no mistake.
text_simple: i shall be mindful make no mistake

name: kidvo_la_respawn_04
text: Recalled from the yonside of death.
text_simple: recalled from the yonside of death

name: kidvo_la_respawn_05
text: The universe was not the same without me.
text_simple: the universe was not the same without me

name: kidvo_la_respawn_06
text: With my return, the cosmos is restored.
text_simple: with my return the cosmos is restored

name: kidvo_la_respawn_08
text: A line without beginning, a line without end.
text_simple: a line without beginning a line without end

name: kidvo_la_respawn_09
text: From the source of self-knowledge, the well of creation, I return.
text_simple: from the source of selfknowledge the well of creation i return

name: kidvo_la_rival_03
text: I don't require flight to drop fire from the sky.
text_simple: i dont require flight to drop fire from the sky

name: kidvo_la_rival_05
text: Religion is not allowed at the academy. Now I know why.
text_simple: religion is not allowed at the academy now i know why

name: kidvo_la_rival_06
text: Does this count as killing a dragon?
text_simple: does this count as killing a dragon

name: kidvo_la_rival_07
text: If earth mattered, it would be an orb.
text_simple: if earth mattered it would be an orb

name: kidvo_la_rival_09
text: So ends your encounter with a true artist.
text_simple: so ends your encounter with a true artist

name: kidvo_la_rival_11
text: Legendary exort. But where's the rest?
text_simple: legendary exort but wheres the rest

name: kidvo_la_rival_12
text: I thought he was a unicorn.
text_simple: i thought he was a unicorn

name: kidvo_la_rival_14
text: The legend of Wu Kong now features MY name.
text_simple: the legend of wu kong now features my name

name: kidvo_la_rival_15
text: I was told you were the one to test me. Hmph. I'm through with tests.
text_simple: i was told you were the one to test me hmph im through with tests

name: kidvo_la_rival_16
text: The mundane is nothing to the arcane.
text_simple: the mundane is nothing to the arcane

name: kidvo_la_rival_17
text: It is I who controls the coming of the storm!
text_simple: it is i who controls the coming of the storm

name: kidvo_la_rival_18
text: We only just met, and I hate you.
text_simple: we only just met and i hate you

name: kidvo_la_rival_19
text: Are there secrets in your death rattle?
text_simple: are there secrets in your death rattle

name: kidvo_la_rival_20
text: Take note. That is how one subjugates.
text_simple: take note that is how one subjugates

name: kidvo_la_rival_21
text: Your domain is not for the likes of me, and never will be.
text_simple: your domain is not for the likes of me and never will be

name: kidvo_la_rival_22
text: Demonology? Not smart enough for real magic?
text_simple: demonology not smart enough for real magic

name: kidvo_la_rival_23
text: My apologies. I realize now that was just a poem... I mistook it for an incantation!
text_simple: my apologies i realize now that was just a poem i mistook it for an incantation

name: kidvo_la_rival_24
text: If only you'd indulged my sweet tooth...
text_simple: if only youd indulged my sweet tooth

name: kidvo_la_rival_25
text: Interesting... Your knowledge may be of use after your demise.
text_simple: interesting your knowledge may be of use after your demise

name: kidvo_la_purch_01
text: I will commit this to memory.
text_simple: i will commit this to memory

name: kidvo_la_purch_02
text: With mind alone, I have made this a reality.
text_simple: with mind alone i have made this a reality

name: kidvo_la_purch_03
text: Months I have waited, and saved, for this.
text_simple: months i have waited and saved for this

name: kidvo_la_item_10
text: I'll take all the spheres I can get.
text_simple: ill take all the spheres i can get

name: kidvo_la_item_61
text: There is much to like about this.
text_simple: there is much to like about this

name: kidvo_la_item_63
text: Let us see what I can do.
text_simple: let us see what i can do

name: kidvo_la_bottle_01
text: I will recall you at a later point.
text_simple: i will recall you at a later point

name: kidvo_la_bottle_02
text: I will think upon this for a time.
text_simple: i will think upon this for a time

name: kidvo_la_deny_09
text: It's all the same to me.
text_simple: its all the same to me

name: kidvo_la_haste_02
text: Still, not as swift as the speed of my thoughts.
text_simple: still not as swift as the speed of my thoughts

name: kidvo_la_doubdam_02
pretty_criteria: Activating a double damage rune (5% chance)

name: kidvo_la_regen_02
text: Vitality, like my knowledge, a well that never empties.
text_simple: vitality like my knowledge a well that never empties

name: kidvo_la_invis_02
text: What need have I for this?
text_simple: what need have i for this

name: kidvo_la_underattack_02
text: Can't you see I'm under attack?!
text_simple: cant you see im under attack

name: kidvo_la_inthebag_01
text: It falls to me to inform you that this one is in the bag!
text_simple: it falls to me to inform you that this one is in the bag

name: kidvo_la_inthebag_02
text: I've learned more than enough to ensure that this one is in the bag.
text_simple: ive learned more than enough to ensure that this one is in the bag

name: kidvo_la_win_03
text: I have rendered it thus with my will alone!
text_simple: i have rendered it thus with my will alone

name: kidvo_la_win_03_02
text: I have rendered it thus with my will alone!
text_simple: i have rendered it thus with my will alone
